lines.text:
[to Deventer]
You've got a brilliant mind, Colonel, but the best of minds will disintegrate without exercise.

[to Carla as they arrive on the farm and get out of the truck]
Home at last! Beautiful isn't it? And this is my charming brother Chris.
Hey, Chris, put the bucket down and say hello to something you've never seen in your entire stupid life - a lady! Well, say something, Chris!
Great talker, this brother of mine - he always was!

[Dryly]
I thought maybe you'd come back to do a job of work for a change.
So much for character, isn't it?
A spy has no character; he merely assumes one.

[to Deventer]
You gave me a reason for living. Don't take it away now like a toy from a child!
It is fascinating. You really trust me, don't you?
I rely on the word of an officer and a gentleman.
That's a weakness, Colonel. It gives me the upper hand.
Mine has a gun in it.
To us, Colonel. Twin souls in a darkening world.
